envelope_type.description: Defines the type of the envelope. For now, the only accepted value is "resource_data"

envelope_version.description: The version that our envelope is using. The current version is "1.0.0"

envelope_community.description: The community related to this envelope. Each community has a different schema for the resource to be encoded. Currently it can be only: "LearningRegistry" and "CredentialRegistry".

resource.description: A string containing the JWT encoded content. The original resource should follow the corresponding envelope_community's schema

resource_format.description: Internal format of our resource. Can be "json" or "xml"

resource_encoding.description: The algorithm used to encode the resource. Currently we only support "jwt"

resource_public_key.description: The public key, in PEM format, whose private part was used to sign the resource. This is strictly needed for signature validation purposes
